name: The Better Price Boutique
description:
A super short, simple and little goofy game for my first game jam.  I just wanted to make a game for a game jam as fast as I can. I'm still new to Godot so things are extra simple.

you can get up to three different scores, to fall in line with thermometer wild card.  It's a super short you can probably play in less than 5 minutes .

This game isn't a very serious one and I understand if you don't want to play because of that. 😊
